channel.title: Pages on Reid Mitchell
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Reid Mitchell

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Reid! I’m a software engineer and filmmaker currently living in San Francisco, CA. I’m passionate about creating things that make people’s lives a little easier or a little more enjoyable. My pronouns are he/him/his. If you’d like to get in touch, you can find me on LinkedIn or maybe Twitter. Some of my projects are up on GitHub.
